name: Point & Click Room [unfinished fragment]
description:
HERE BE DRAGONS: This is a game that was never meant to be released in this state. As such, the quality may be subpar and the game might be full of bugs. It might even randomly crash.

A game submitted to the Fragment Jam.  This is a prototype for a point-n-click adventure game I made back in 2016. This was actually one of the more polished projects and I did my best to keep the code nice and clean as well.  It's more of a proof of concept of engine code than anything else.

There's a way to open the door on the right, if you found the solution, congratulations! You've finished the shortest point-n-click adventure ever.

Controls (mouse only): 

Left click: Move / take / use
Right click: Inspect
Scroll down: Open inventory
Scroll up: Close inventory
